"Xiandy": "Thank you for coming. I'd like to reintroduce myself."
"I'm Xiandy. I'm studying the various peculiar phenomena that occur on Halpha."
"I contacted you as I'd like your assistance with my investigations into these phenomena."
"Thank you very much for coming."
"I'd like you to do some research for me again..."
"Do you know of the Regional Mags? They tend to change their appearance at this time of year."
"There are also Gathering Materials that are only obtainable at this time..."
"I want to learn what effects those materials might have if given to Regional Mags in their current state."
"Firstly, could you collect these materials?"
"We have special rewards prepared in return for your help."
"I'll leave the rest to you."
"Welcome back! Thanks to you, we have obtained some great data."
"Though many mysteries surround the Regional Mags, this data will help us decipher them."
"Other researchers look to be interested in your work as well."
"I'll introduce you to them next time!"
"Thank you very much for helping us on this occasion."
"You can exchange your points for rewards, so let me know if there's anything you need."
"Your continued assistance with our surveys and research would be greatly appreciated."
"I look forward to continuing to work with you."
"We are carefully investigating the enemy's recent changes."
"Any data you can get would be greatly appreciated, no matter now trivial."
